title: Please fix "trying to reconnect" error! (macOS 2019)
body:
We, I and my brother, had this issue now for years, every now and then after a patch we are getting this "trying to reconnect" error, until it disappears for few versions, just to come back in half a year or so. Every time we search everywhere online and try every work around/fix, with out luck.
The only solution to this problem is to wait until the message disappears, and everything works fine. Sometimes this is done in 1-2 minutes but sometimes we sit around for half an hour without luck.
Please fix this issue, as it makes the game very frustrating to play/start and often leads to just don't play because it is hard to justify 30 mins of waiting for 40 min of gameplay.

if anyone has a recent fix of that please let me know.
we have a 2018 and 2014 MacBook Pro and the most recent software updates, but it appeared independently form the OS version.

replies.body: I have the same problem!! i tweeted at them already and im sure they know the issue is there, but there's no hot fix no information, nothing. There even is a reddit post with 15,2k upvotes about this topic already. RIOT FIX THE GAME
